hero.title: Milov AI
hero.subtitle: Full stack developer expert in automation and AI

list.title: Social Connect PWA (Personal Project)
list.content: Architected and developed a progressive web app (PWA) using React 19, Vite, and Tailwind CSS 4, deploying the solution to Web and Android environments via Capacitor. Engineered a security module ('The Vault') implementing client-side AES encryption with crypto-js to protect sensitive data privacy. Implemented a 'Local-First' synchronization architecture with queue management and conflict resolution, ensuring offline data integrity. Integrated Supabase for authentication management, media storage, and PostgreSQL, optimizing session persistence.

list.title: AI & Automation Ecosystems
list.content: Orchestrated an ecosystem of 19 AI agents, developing Chain of Thought processes to automate content marketing campaigns. Designed a 5-agent processing chain that transforms unstructured data into optimized HTML resumes, ensuring autonomous execution. Forged a monolithic generative agent (Gemini) that synthesizes 4 video scripts and vocal archetypes in a single execution. Established a canonical JSON schema for data exchange between agents, ensuring frictionless integration.

list.title: Milov AI
list.content: Architected a modular and reusable component system based on shadcn/ui and TypeScript ensuring scalability. Implemented advanced animations integrating GSAP to elevate interactivity and visual appeal. Integrated full internationalization (i18n) allowing dynamic language switching for global reach.

list.title: Generative AI Pipeline (GCP)
list.content: Deployed a self-hosted automation platform on Google Cloud Platform, orchestrating a dual Docker container environment that reduced operating costs by 90% (from $50 to $5/mo). Architected an end-to-end video pipeline, implementing parallel processing and utilizing Google Transcoder API. Eliminated FFMPEG rendering failures by designing a strict timestamp normalization protocol.

list.title: Notiplay
list.content: Architected news SPA using the modern stack of React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. Implemented backend ecosystem with Supabase, orchestrating OAuth authentication, PostgreSQL, and RLS security. Engineered robust gamification system with contextual trivia, animated Leaderboards, and rewards marketplace.

list.title: LinguaFlow
list.content: Designed translation web application using React and Node.js (Fastify) with decoupled architecture. Integrated Google Gemini 2.5 Flash via Vercel AI SDK for simultaneous detection and translation to three languages. Implemented strict schema validation with Zod on backend to guarantee data integrity.

list.title: Project Estimation AI (Academic)
list.content: Implemented Monte Carlo simulation with 20,000 iterations using Web Workers in React/TypeScript architecture. Designed Artificial Bee Colony (ABC) algorithm for resource optimization.

list.title: JHOKER SPORT S.A.S.
list.content: Engineered a scalable production control system in Google Sheets, centralizing manual processes through key functions in Google Apps Script that automated data aggregation and workflow management. Automated the creation of production order modules, drastically reducing configuration time by dynamically generating linked Google Forms and Sheets. Designed 3 automated BI dashboards using advanced QUERY and ARRAYFORMULA functions, providing real-time tracking of operator efficiency and module performance.

list.title: JHOKER SPORT S.A.S.
list.content: Led the full lifecycle of an inventory management project, from requirements analysis to production deployment, delivering a robust solution aligned with strategic objectives. Architected a full-stack solution with a centralized database and robust security (JWT and RLS), establishing an EAN-13 code identification system as the single source of truth. Implemented a dual inventory recording system (manual and scan) that minimized dispatch errors and significantly optimized search times.
